price: 13. (Dialah) Allah, tidak ada Tuhan (yang berhak disembah) selain Dia. Dan hendaklah orang-orang mukmin bertawakal kepada Allah.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۚ وَعَلَى ٱللَّهِ فَلۡيَتَوَكَّلِ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa waʿalā al-lahi falyatawakkali al-mu'minūna
